attributes.action: immediately declare fraudulent and theft of taxpayer pounds the DFiD scheme which allows members of the department to rake off the difference between the cost of travel at business and economy classes and keep the difference for their personal use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is downright legalised THEFT of taxpayer pounds and needs to be stopped immediately and EVERY SINGLE pound used by members of this department for private travel, out of their travel expenses pool fund, needs to be recovered to the public purse.
